titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a limited exclusion from gross income for interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $1,250 ($2,500 for joint returns) of interest earned on a savings account maintained in a savings and loan or similar institution.
